title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now, select both P1 and P2.
OB: Upon selecting both P1 and P2, it is observed that the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' option is not.
EB: The expected behavior is that either both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' should be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Observe the status of the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items.
